welcome_message_body: Welcome to Momil, Colombia! Get ready to experience the charm of our historical city known for its beautiful architecture, delicious food, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Momil has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tolu Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corozal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Corozal Airport handles all cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Jeronimo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at S. Jeronimo Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
